metadata.title: CVE-2018-18245 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
Nagios Core 4.4.2 has XSS via the alert summary reports of plugin results, as demonstrated by a SCRIPT element delivered by a modified check_load plugin to NRPE.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-18245` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

nagios4 - 4.3.4-3
nagios4-cgi - 4.3.4-3
nagios4-common - 4.3.4-3
nagios4-core - 4.3.4-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nagios4 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.4-3').
